actions.text: On agreeing to the Wittman amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Wittman.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Wittman amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: An amendment No. 1 printed in House Report 114-429 to delete Title XII which has been enacted into law already; remove outdated year references in short titles; make expenditures under the Federal Land Transaction Facilitation Act subject to appropriation; and add the text of HR 3279, as passed by the House, as a new title XVII.
purpose: Manager's amendment deletes title XII which has been enacted into law already; removes outdated year references in short titles; makes expenditures under the Federal Land Transaction Facilitation Act subject to appropriation; and adds the text of H.R. 3279, as passed by the House, as a new title XVII.
